nodes.text: Thorn Maw was a male Esh-kha savant who was freed from imprisonment in the Tomb on Belsavis during the Galactic War. Thorn Maw was among the Esh-kha warriors who took over the canyon known as the Scar, but was slain.
Thorn Maw is the target of the final stage of "Prison Scars," an Area mission for Republic players on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
